# Request for Information: Accessible Information and Communication Technology (ICT) - Vendor Readiness ## Table of Contents - [1. Background and Purpose](#background-and-purpose) - [2. Scope of this RFI](#scope-this-rfi) - [3. Objectives of this RFI](#objectives-of-this-rfi) - [4. Vendor Readiness](#vendor-readiness) - [5. Submission Requirements](#submission-requirements) - [6. Contact Information](#contact-information) ## Background and Purpose Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is developing regulations under the Accessible Canada Act (ACA) to remove barriers and improve accessibility in Information and Communication Technologies (ICT). This Request for Information (RFI) aims to gather stakeholders' opinions on vendor readiness and measures to meet international ICT standards. ## Scope of this RFI This RFI is open to all vendors and suppliers of ICT products and services. It seeks to understand their readiness to comply with international ICT accessibility standards, the challenges they face in meeting these standards, and the impact of these standards on the disability community. ## Objectives of this RFI The objectives of this RFI are to: * Gather information on vendor readiness towards ICT accessibility standards * Identify the challenges associated with meeting these standards * Understand the impact of these standards on the disability community * Solicit feedback on vendors' experience with accessible ICT and procurement toolkits ## Vendor Readiness To meet the objectives of this RFI, vendors are expected to provide information on their: * Current level of ICT accessibility * Measures taken to meet international ICT standards * Challenges faced in meeting these standards * Experience with accessible ICT and procurement toolkits ## Submission Requirements Submissions should include the following: * Vendor name and contact information * Company profile and relevant experience * Description of vendor readiness towards ICT accessibility standards * Feedback on vendors' experience with accessible ICT and procurement toolkits ## Contact Information All inquiries and expressions of interest should be directed to: Ekaterina Suvorova, Project Manager,Procurement
Employment and Social Development Canada
